amendment.description: To specify that no additional funds are authorized to be appropriated for the purpose of carrying out the Act.

vote.text: Amendment SA 934 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 934 proposed by Senator Schumer for Senator Cornyn. (consideration: CR S3118) To specify that no additional funds are authorized to be appropriated for the purpose of carrying out the Act.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 934 proposed by Senator Schumer for Senator Cornyn.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 934 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
